title: Do not Tech
content: Tech is scary, it will ruin us all.

title: Computers are cool
content: ...I wanna be a computer when I grow up...

title: Animals as Computers
content: Really, if ya think about it, aren't all animals just computers in furry suits?

title: Who made this?

title: Bezos builds bunker behind broken bathroom...
content: According to reputable sources, Jeff Bezos is building an underground bunker behind a bathroom in the Amazon rainforest, I mean HQ
